channel.title: Cleveland Force Soccer Club Newsletters
channel.description: Cleveland Force Soccer Club Newsletters v.1

item.title: The Force Effect - September 2021
item.author: Everett Palache
item.description: We hope this note finds you all doing well! We are excited to release our CFSC September Newsletter attached to this email! Our September newsletter edition highlights: College Placement with CFSC, ECNL Boys & Girls, CFSC Player Pathway, HundredX Funding Campaign - Ends September 13th!

item.title: The Force Effect - October 2021
item.author: Everett Palache
item.description: We hope this note finds you all doing well and enjoying the start of Fall! We are excited to release our CFSC October Newsletter attached to this email! This month's edition highlights: CFSC & Girl Thriving Program Partnership; Playing Soccer vs Playing At Soccer; CFSC Vision: Education and Player Pathways; Soccer Today - CFSC Education Department; What's Next? Upcoming CFSC Events. We hope you enjoy the articles and your weekend!
